description: Sink your teeth into this delicious breakfast bagel burger that features smoky bacon, eggs and avocado. It's a pretty special way to start your day!
keywords: Breakfast burger,Fakeaway,Seafood free,Quick & easy breakfast,Tree nut free,Jan Feb 2021,Avocado,Peanut free
name: Breakfast Bagel Burgers Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large frying pan over medium-high heat. Add bacon and cook for 4 minutes on each side or until golden and crisp. Transfer to a plate lined with paper towel.
Heat oil in same pan over medium-high heat. Crack eggs into pan and cook for 4 minutes or until cooked to your liking.
Meanwhile, using a fork, lightly mash avocado in a bowl. Add lime juice and Tabasco, then stir to combine. Season.
Spread bagel bases with avocado mixture, then top with bacon, eggs and relish. Sandwich with bagel tops and serve.
